flawed_nl_solution:
He total temperature for the week is 629 because 99.1 plus 98.2 plus 98.7 plus 99.3 plus 99.8 plus 99 plus 98.9 equals 629.
His average temperature is 99 degrees because 693 divided by 7 equals <<693/7=99>>99.
#### 99

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 692, not 629. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
